statements: DELETE FROM iris_scan_data WHERE id = 1 AND scan_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM iris_scan_data WHERE security_level = 'High' AND scan_result = 'Suspicious';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND access_level = 'Admin';
DELETE FROM iris_scans WHERE employee_id = 100 AND scan_results = 'Incomplete';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND employee_name LIKE '%Smith%';
DELETE FROM iris_scans WHERE scan_id = 100 AND person_id = 50;
DELETE FROM persons WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' AND access_level > 2;
